article.Heading: Budget 2016: Skilled labour still a challenge in Sanand
article.Summary: In the third part of Budget Caravan series, CNBC-TV18's Farah Bookwala Vhora finds out the challenges faced by Sanand workforce.
article.Body:
The biggest enabler to PM Narendra Modi's 'Make in India' programe is skilled workforce. To this end, the central government introduced the 'Skill India' Programme last year, which envisages skilling 40 crore youth by 2022.

This comes at an opportune time because even as the automotive hub of Sanand undergoes rapid development, finding the right skilled workforce poses a major challenge.

CNBC-TV18's Farah Bookwala Vhora finds out more in the third part of Budget Caravan series.

Watch video for more
